name: Critical Bilbo
description: Critical Bilbo is a powerful indica-dominant strain that holds several Cannabis Cup championships under its belt. A legend among Spain’s cannabis consumers, Critical Bilbo’s resinous, sage-green buds emit a sweet, fruity aroma. Its effects are heavy and narcotic, a top-shelf strain oftentimes too intoxicating for novices. This strain grows best indoors or in greenhouse gardens, and flowers in just 45 to 50 days.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Creative, Hungry, Euphoric, Nausea, Muscle Spasms, Stress, Insomnia, Depression, Dizzy, Anxious, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid
